channel.title: Great Map Locations (Underground)
channel.description:
In most of the servers I have played on, The underground areas of Runescape have been left untouched, so here are a few good ones I have found that can maybe spark your imagination. You can access them using the ::tele (x) (Y) command.
Name X-Pos Y-Pos L-Shape unknown land. Good position to develop. Slightly south of archery guild. 2630 9351 Lot’s of space to build new things. Possibly a city.
Temple of Ikov. Good to turn into a fighting arena. 2658 9828
Tunnel from lumbridge cellar. 3222 9618
Square Room with shapes. Good for puzzle games. (Below duel arena) 3364 9640
Duel arena. Directly above puzzle room (above) 3364 3240
Glarials Tomb. A small Tomb, nothing special really. 2542 9818
Not sure what this is. Could be a good fight arena. 2387 9816
The gnome workshop for making Gliders. Possibly good for training area. 2396 9874
Possible site for a PK fightpit. With possible viewing area’s at each side. 2402 9703
A good site for mage/range training. 2397 9606
Castle wars underground area. Rocks block exit, so this could make a 2401 9503 very good fighting area. Ladders DO work though.
Underground maze looking place. Could be great for a mini-game. 2405 9426
More to Come...
On a further note, if you want to post your own ideas with some suggestions than post them below. BTW, before some retard say I leeched these locations from his mums house or his bin or something, I literally sat for the last 30 minutes and searched for these locations. Sorry about the layout. I couldn't work out the tables :P. Hope they [u]help[/u] (being the help and support forum).

legend rene:

I made a list of nearly all dungeons available in 377 , for alot of them you need to change your heighlvl , ill post the list soon.

item.title: Great Map Locations (Underground)
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

I really appreciate this, I am trying to get a compendium of all underground locations to fix stairs and such. Thanks I do have my own hosting, seperate from a local computer with decent speed and bandwidth if your developments are useful you can send me a PM discussing it, and I might be able to offer you real hosting.

Read full topic
